title: Lightened-Up Cheesecake Dip {two ways}
directions: Add cottage cheese and Greek yogurt to the bowl of a food processor and process until they form a smooth paste.
Add coconut flour and powdered sugar and continue processing.
Add your add-ins of choice, and process until fully incorporated.
Transfer to a bowl and enjoy! Store in a covered container in the fridge.
ingredients: 2 - 4 Tbsp. powdered sugar, depending how sweet you want it
